api_list.api_description: Retrieves a specific entry given its name or ID.

required_parameters.name: entry
required_parameters.description: The name or ID of the entry.

optional_parameters.name: game
optional_parameters.description: The game version to query; defaults to 'botw'.

api_list.api_description: Get details about a specific Pokémon by ID or name.

required_parameters.name: id or name
required_parameters.description: The ID or name of the Pokémon.

query: Can you provide information about 'Moblin' from the Hyrule Compendium and also details about 'Pikachu' from the PokéAPI?

api_list.api_description: Retrieves all entries in a given category.

required_parameters.name: category
required_parameters.description: The category to retrieve entries from.

api_list.api_description: Get information about a specific berry by ID or name.

required_parameters.name: id or name
required_parameters.description: The ID or name of the berry.

query: Please fetch all the 'monsters' category entries from the Hyrule Compendium and get details for the 'Cheri' berry from the PokéAPI.

api_list.api_description: Retrieves information on a single region given its name.
Get details about a specific Pokémon type by ID or name.

required_parameters.name: id or name
required_parameters.description: The ID or name of the Pokémon type.

query: What is known about the 'Eldin' region from the Hyrule Compendium and the characteristics of the 'ground' Pokémon type?
